content: the bari court recently made a final ruling on a case that lasted 11 years the court declared an open hereditary succession and granted the application for division of the property the estate which included various real estate properties was valued at €142972730 by an expert witness appointed by the court the estate was divided into three equal shares with each party receiving their respective share the court also ordered the payment of expenses and debts related to the estate the court ensured that the division of the estate protected the interests of all parties involved additionally the court mentioned the involvement of a company and the settlement of a debt secured by a mortgage the judgment will be recorded in the real estate registers and the costs of the proceedings will be shared between the parties the court also determined that the fees of the expert witness will be divided proportionally among the parties the final ruling was issued on february 7 2019 by the judge
